subtle.name: Subtle
subtle.description: Very subtle noise - ideal for high-end cameras in good lighting. Barely perceptible but breaks up AI smoothness

normal.name: Normal
normal.description: Normal noise - typical DSLR/mirrorless at ISO 400-800. Visible on close inspection but natural-looking

moderate.name: Moderate
moderate.description: Moderate noise - higher ISO (1600-3200) or lower-end sensor. Clearly visible but still pleasing and organic

flat.name: Flat
flat.description: Flat/uniform - minimal variance, even distribution. For when you want consistent noise across image

real.name: Real
real.description: Realistic camera noise with custom balanced settings
